info.name: Raydell's Compact Steam UI
info.description:
Keep the Steam store clean and simple!
This custom style removes all the potentially unwanted elements of the updated Steam store such as the curators (from both the front page and the game pages), the recommendations, the queue, the new on Steam, the recently updated and the endlessly scrolling list at the bottom.
info.additionalInfo:
Changelog:

V2.1.3 - 2018.03.09. - Updated to the latest state of the client skin.

V2.1.2 - 2016.11.23. - Various fixes to lower resolution displays and some positioning issues when the store has a large special ad on top.

V2.1.0 - 2016.11.20. - Moved the Special Offers (daily deal, etc) into a column on the right. This change only affects resolutions at or above 1440x900. The store is now also better centered.

V2.0.0 - 2016.11.08. - First-response update making the skin compatible with Steam's latest large store page overhaul.

V1.1.0 - 2015.06.01. - Fixed front page lag caused by the removal of scrolling recommendations.

V1.0.0 - 2014.12.27. - The initial release.
